options.label: Search URL (e.g. search)
options.name: url
options.note: Used to generate search page url. E.g. example.com/search/...

options.label: Use GET parameter
options.name: useGet
options.note: Use example.com/search/?q=xxx URLs instead of example.com/search/xxx

options.label: GET parameter name
options.name: queryVariableName
options.note: Meaningful only if "Use GET parameter" is enabled. CAN'T BE EMPTY!
